Landing.hero_description: Transform your real estate dealings using AI-powered chatbots. Elevate client interactions, enhance property visibility, and close deals quicker than ever before!
Landing.early_access_description: We will get in touch to provide access on alpha version of the application.
Landing.early_access_submission_sent: Thank you for signing up! We will be in touch with you, so stay tuned for updates!
Landing.early_access_submission_duplicate: Oops! This email address has already been registered in the system. Please try with a different email address.
Landing.early_access_submission_error: We're sorry, an error occurred during the registration process. Please try again later or contact us for assistance.

Metadata.dashboard_description: Control all your properties with the help of AI.

Dashboard.copied_failed: Copy did not work. Please try again.
Dashboard.import_data_description: Import a listing from an existing provider like Storia, OLX.
Dashboard.import_data_failed: Import failed, try again, if it persists, manually copy the data you need below.
